title: PCB to telecast Pakistan-Bangladesh women’s series in Lahore
text:
The Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) will telecast Pakistan vs Bangladesh women’s international series on their official Youtube channel.

Both the teams are scheduled to play three T20Is and two ODIs at Gaddafi Stadium, Lahore from October 26 to November 4.

The cricket board has also revealed the names of commentators who will be a part of this historic women’s series.

Former international cricketers Mujahid Jamshed and Yasir Hamid, Hassan Cheema, Mohammad Salman, Tariq Saeed, Raja Asad Ali Khan, and Shamsa Hashmi.

On the other hand, the board has also decided to make cricket fans’ entrance free to watch the match at Gaddafi Stadium.

It is pertinent to mention here that Bangladesh has already reached Lahore. They will take on the hosts in the first T20I on Saturday [26 October].
